p.s: This excerpt is the start of the stronger trust between Starr and Chris' relationship.
After Chris comes into the Hallwayhallway the camera focuses on him and moves with him, while Starr is at the lockers.
It's a medium shot when Chris walks towards Starr, and the shot is in slow motion.
A dreamy song is played when Starr looks at him, which means that he means a lot to her.
She also scrutinizes him and says a lot about Chris, which a normal person wouldn't know, unless they like him.
When Chris tells Starr that he misses her, you can tell that he means it because of his worried look to Starr, which is emphasized through the close up of his face.
Starr is still upset and doesn't acknowledge it and looklooks away as if she were bored of his words.
When Chris notices this, he knows that he has to do better to cheer Starr up and starts to dance to his song for Starr.
You can see students in the background while Chris dances in the foreground in a medium shot.
He doesn't hesitate to dance and isn't embarassedembarrassed to show off infrontin front of Starr.
This means a lot for Starr because she get'sgets reminded of why she likes Chris so much, and starts to laugh.
It shows, that she has mostly forgiven him for what he has done before.
These things make a nice impression of their strong relationship.
At the end of the scene Starr grabs his hand and pulls him away of the hallway, which is a sign of a strong bind between them.
Even Chris said that he wants to get closer to Starr himself.
This presents his love for Starr.
The hypothesis of the relationship between Starr is proven mainly through the dance by Chris.
It shows that he trusts her and would do anything to cheer her up.
You can tell that Chris cares about Starr more than what people think of him and he will be there for Starr when she needs him to calm her down.
